title: Battlefield 2 - Online Playable (FULL + KEYGEN)
description:
When you download this pack and follow the steps in installer so you will be fully able to play online. This setup works only with fresh installs. Never update your game otherwise you can&#039;t connect to servers.

[*] I don&#039;t recommend ISO tools( like Iso buster, Magic ?so etc) to run installer.

[*] Please just mount with Daemon Tools for not having errors like " insert CD"


[*] You can run game with( 128 mb) geforce fx5200 or ati radeon 9200 but can&#039;t play online.


[*] Do Not Use a Cracked Exe to launch game. Only way to run game without crashing is using an image file.


[*] Check your page file size. Cause low page file size increases number of game crashing.( for 1Gigs of ram min/max 1536--2048)


[*] Update your VGA driver if you are having crashing problems allways.


[*] Some antivirus&#039;s firewall or apps like zone alarm blocks Punkbuster exe to connect internet. So check that punkbusterA.exe and punkbusterB.exe can connect internet. Otherwise punkbuster kicks you. 

You Dont Need Any Of This Downloads If You Already Downloaded Pack. 

========================================================================
System Requirements
========================================================================

----- Operating System----- 
Windows XP (32 Bit Version)

----- CPU----- 
Battlefield 2 supports the following processors:
Intel Pentium 4
Intel Xeon
Intel Pentium Extreme Edition
Intel Celeron D
AMD Athlon XP
AMD Athlon 64
AMD Athlon 64-FX
AMD Sempron processor

----- Minimum Specification----- 
CPU: 1.7 Ghz
RAM: 512 Mb
Video Card: NVidia GeForce FX 5700, ATI Radeon 8500 or ATI Radeon 9500
with 128 Mb of RAM


----- Recommended Specification----
CPU: 2.4 Ghz
RAM: 1 Gb
Video Card with at least 256 Mb of RAM

----- Video Cards----- 
Battlefield 2 only supports the following video cards:
Radeon X700 (PCIe)
Radeon X600 (PCIe)
GeForce 6600 (PCIe)
GeForce PCX 5900 (PCIe)
GeForce 5800 Series (AGP)
ATI Radeon X800 XT Platinum Edition
ATI Radeon X800 PRO
ATI Radeon 9800 Series
ATI Radeon 9600 Series
ATI Radeon 9550 (RV350LX)
ATI Radeon 9500 / 9700 Series
ATI Radeon 8500 Series
ATI Radeon X300 Series
NVidia GeForce 6800 Ultra
NVidia GeForce 6800 GT
NVidia GeForce 6800
NVidia GeForce FX 5950 Series
NVidia GeForce FX 5900 Series
NVidia GeForce FX 5700 Series

Enjoy and Seed please  8)
